entry.title: Actualización de cuentas bancarios en socios de negocio por Service Layer
entry.content:
Buen día, 

Estoy tratando de actualizar un registro ya existente en las cuentas bancarios de los socios de negocio, sin embargo, siempre arroja el error "Esta entrada ya existe". Intenté añadir el campo "InternalKey", que identifica los registros en la tabla OCRB pero no hay un resultado exitoso. ¿Como debería ser el cuerpo de la petición para poder actualizar un campo de un registro ya existente de esta tabla?

entry.title: SAP Business One
entry.content: Hello all, Currently I am working as SAP Business one - Functional Consultant in a startup Company from past 3 months . So is it good to stay in SAP Business One for some years in a same company ? or should i learn SAP S/4 Hana ? entry.title: Picking Allowed Despite Negative Available Quantity, Order Confirmation Blocked in SAP
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have a Sales Order where SAP allowed allocation of 473 pcs in Bin Location Allocation – Issue, even though the available quantity shows -41 pcs. The scanner permits Pick and Pack, but when I try to confirm the order, the process is blocked, and I cannot print the Delivery Order.

Could you help me understand why this happens and how to resolve it?

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: SAP B1/SQL Server 2019 Query Error when entering Parameter
entry.content:
If i use QUERY by not use '[%0]' No Problem

SELECT
B.Bo_Pl_No AS [WMS No.],
X.TransferNo AS [Transfer No.],
CONVERT(date, B.Bo_CreateDate) AS [Date],
P.Tp_ItemCode AS [Item No.],
I.ItemName AS [Item Name],
CAST(P.Tp_Qty AS decimal(19,6)) AS [Quantity],
B.Bo_No AS [Box No.]
FROM dbo.TB_Box AS B
JOIN dbo.TB_TempPick AS P ON P.Tp_Box = B.Bo_No
LEFT JOIN OITM AS I ON I.ItemCode = P.Tp_ItemCode
LEFT JOIN (
SELECT
COALESCE(CAST(T.U_wmsno AS nvarchar(50)),
CAST(T.U_plateno AS nvarchar(50))) AS WMSNo,
STRING_AGG(CAST(T.DocNum AS nvarchar(20)), ', ')
WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY T.DocNum) AS TransferNo
FROM OWTR T
JOIN NNM1 S
ON S.Series = T.Series
AND S.ObjectCode = '67'
WHERE T.CANCELED = 'N'
AND S.SeriesName LIKE 'ITS%'
GROUP BY COALESCE(CAST(T.U_wmsno AS nvarchar(50)),
CAST(T.U_plateno AS nvarchar(50)))
) AS X ON CAST(B.Bo_Pl_No AS nvarchar(50)) = X.WMSNo

WHERE
B.Bo_Active = 1
AND P.Tp_Active = 1
AND (ISNULL('','') = '' OR CONVERT(date, B.Bo_CreateDate) >= CONVERT(date, ''))
AND (ISNULL('','') = '' OR CONVERT(date, B.Bo_CreateDate) <= CONVERT(date, ''))
AND (ISNULL('','') = '' OR B.Bo_Pl_No = '')
AND (ISNULL('','') = '' OR B.Bo_No = '')
ORDER BY
B.Bo_CreateDate, B.Bo_Pl_No, B.Bo_No, P.Tp_ItemCode;

But if i entering Parameter such as '[%0]' will be error immediately

Error 'Received Alert' (OAIB)

SELECT
B.Bo_Pl_No AS [WMS No.],
X.TransferNo AS [Transfer No.],
CONVERT(date, B.Bo_CreateDate) AS [Date],
P.Tp_ItemCode AS [Item No.],
I.ItemName AS [Item Name],
CAST(P.Tp_Qty AS decimal(19,6)) AS [Quantity],
B.Bo_No AS [Box No.]
FROM dbo.TB_Box AS B
JOIN dbo.TB_TempPick AS P ON P.Tp_Box = B.Bo_No
LEFT JOIN OITM AS I ON I.ItemCode = P.Tp_ItemCode
LEFT JOIN (
SELECT
COALESCE(CAST(T.U_wmsno AS nvarchar(50)),
CAST(T.U_plateno AS nvarchar(50))) AS WMSNo,
STRING_AGG(CAST(T.DocNum AS nvarchar(20)), ', ')
WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY T.DocNum) AS TransferNo
FROM OWTR T
JOIN NNM1 S
ON S.Series = T.Series
AND S.ObjectCode = '67'
WHERE T.CANCELED = 'N'
AND S.SeriesName LIKE 'ITS%'
GROUP BY COALESCE(CAST(T.U_wmsno AS nvarchar(50)),
CAST(T.U_plateno AS nvarchar(50)))
) AS X ON CAST(B.Bo_Pl_No AS nvarchar(50)) = X.WMSNo

WHERE
B.Bo_Active = 1
AND P.Tp_Active = 1
AND (ISNULL('[%0]','') = '' OR CONVERT(date, B.Bo_CreateDate) >= CONVERT(date, '[%0]'))
AND (ISNULL('[%1]','') = '' OR CONVERT(date, B.Bo_CreateDate) <= CONVERT(date, '[%1]'))
AND (ISNULL('[%2]','') = '' OR B.Bo_Pl_No = '[%2]')
AND (ISNULL('[%3]','') = '' OR B.Bo_No = '[%3]')
ORDER BY
B.Bo_CreateDate, B.Bo_Pl_No, B.Bo_No, P.Tp_ItemCode;

entry.title: SAP Business One 2502 SQL SBO mailer service Stuck
entry.content: I am using SAP Business one 2502 version SQL . i faced a problem my sbo mailer service is stuck in every 8 to 10 days. Service is running but mail not send when i restart service SBO mailer running fine. What is the issue ?

entry.title: SAP Business One UI Configuration + Boyum Item Placement Tool
entry.content:
What is the exact method to use UI Configuration and Boyum IPT.

UI Configuration:
US Simple
1. Should I create another Group such as "Company Base" copy from US Simple and then make edits.
2. Apply a user.
3. Use IPT for Function Buttons

If I do that and then I need to make a change in one of the tabs or Form Settings in UI Configuration, is that okay?
In my experience as soon as make any change even an active/non-active status on a matrix col. It places all the IPT buttons on the UI including the US Simple.

Your help is greatly appreciated. If you have a how-to/tutorial video I would greatly appreciate it.

entry.title: SAP Business One Version Upgrade on Cloud Control Center
entry.content:
Hi 

i am looking for guidance on SAP Business One version upgrade on Cloud Control Center Architecture.

Currently i am running  1000.280.18 (2502 Release) and i am going to upgrade it to Version 2508.

Cloud Control Center Version 1.1 PL20 Hotfix 3

1. i have downloaded 2508 and replaced the existing files in repository with new files

2. When i am running pre-upgrade test wizard its showing new version with 0 service units (in my CCC only having 1 service unit and 1 db instance so its not allowed to add new service unit)

3. also my service unit status showing alert icon from long time ago but it was not effected to the functionality.

Can someone guide what are steps should i follow ?

entry.title: Goods issue transaction added without having authorization to user
entry.content:
Dear Team,
We have identified a user who does not have authorization rights for the Goods Issue transaction, yet the transaction has been recorded under their ID.
We have reviewed the change log in the user's authorization settings. Further investigation may be required to understand how this occurred.

entry.title: SAP B1 10.0 FP2105 DI API ProductionOrderType always 'S'
entry.content:
private void AddProcessToSAP(ProductionOrderDTO process, SAPbobsCOM.Company company)
{
SAPbobsCOM.Recordset recordSet = (SAPbobsCOM.Recordset)company.GetBusinessObject(SAPbobsCOM.BoObjectTypes.BoRecordset);
recordSet.DoQuery($"SELECT TOP 1 DocEntry FROM OWOR WHERE Comments like '%{process.UserKey}%'");
if (recordSet.EoF) 
{
SAPbobsCOM.ProductionOrders productionOrder = (SAPbobsCOM.ProductionOrders)company.GetBusinessObject(SAPbobsCOM.BoObjectTypes.oProductionOrders);

SAPbobsCOM.Items item = (SAPbobsCOM.Items)company.GetBusinessObject(SAPbobsCOM.BoObjectTypes.oItems);
if (item.GetByKey(process.Material))
{
DateTime dtStartDate;
DateTime dtDeadLine;
productionOrder.ProductionOrderType = SAPbobsCOM.BoProductionOrderTypeEnum.bopotStandard;
productionOrder.ItemNo = process.Material;
productionOrder.PlannedQuantity = process.PlannedQuantity;
if (DateTime.TryParse(process.StartDate, out dtStartDate) == true)
{
productionOrder.PostingDate = dtStartDate;
}

if (DateTime.TryParse(process.Deadline, out dtDeadLine) == true)
{
productionOrder.DueDate = dtDeadLine;
}

productionOrder.ProductionOrderStatus = SAPbobsCOM.BoProductionOrderStatusEnum.boposPlanned;
productionOrder.Remarks = process.UserKey + " " + process.Remarks;
if (productionOrder.Add() != 0)
{
Console.WriteLine($"Error adding productionOrder: {company.GetLastErrorDescription()}");
}

}
}
else
{
DateTime dtDeadLine;
string docEntry = recordSet.Fields.Item("DocEntry").Value.ToString();

SAPbobsCOM.ProductionOrders productionOrder =
(SAPbobsCOM.ProductionOrders)company.GetBusinessObject(SAPbobsCOM.BoObjectTypes.oProductionOrders);

if (productionOrder.GetByKey(int.Parse(docEntry))) 
{
bool bChanged = false;
if (DateTime.TryParse(process.Deadline, out dtDeadLine) == true)
{
if (productionOrder.DueDate != dtDeadLine)
{
bChanged = true;
productionOrder.DueDate = dtDeadLine;
}
}

switch (process.Status)
{
case "PLANNED":
if (productionOrder.ProductionOrderStatus != SAPbobsCOM.BoProductionOrderStatusEnum.boposPlanned)
{
bChanged = true;
productionOrder.ProductionOrderStatus = SAPbobsCOM.BoProductionOrderStatusEnum.boposPlanned;
}
break;
case "RELEASED":
if (productionOrder.ProductionOrderStatus != SAPbobsCOM.BoProductionOrderStatusEnum.boposReleased)
{
bChanged = true;
productionOrder.ProductionOrderStatus = SAPbobsCOM.BoProductionOrderStatusEnum.boposReleased;
}
break;
case "FINISHED":
if (productionOrder.ProductionOrderStatus != SAPbobsCOM.BoProductionOrderStatusEnum.boposClosed)
{
bChanged = true;
productionOrder.ProductionOrderStatus = SAPbobsCOM.BoProductionOrderStatusEnum.boposClosed;
}
break;
case "CANCELLED":
if (productionOrder.ProductionOrderStatus != SAPbobsCOM.BoProductionOrderStatusEnum.boposCancelled)
{
bChanged = true;
productionOrder.ProductionOrderStatus = SAPbobsCOM.BoProductionOrderStatusEnum.boposCancelled;
}
break;
default:
break;
}

if (productionOrder.Remarks != process.UserKey + " " + process.Remarks)
{
bChanged = true;
productionOrder.Remarks = process.UserKey + " " + process.Remarks;
}

if (bChanged == true)
{
if (productionOrder.Update() != 0)
{
Console.WriteLine($"Error adding productionOrder: {company.GetLastErrorDescription()}");
}
}
}

}
}

DI API version 10.0 FP2105

Hy,

The created ProductionOrder's Type is always 'S' (bopotSpecial) but I set it as bopotStandard so it should be 'P' and the GetByKey() can't give back 'S' Type productionOrders.
Has it been fix in later versions, if yes which one?

Thanks

entry.title: New learner
entry.content:
Hello everyone,
I recently got access to SAP Learning Hub (student edition) and I’m very motivated to start learning SAP. Since I’m a beginner, I would really appreciate your advice on how to build a structured learning path.

 Which modules or courses should I start with?
 How can I organize my learning (step by step)?

My background is in Industrial Engineering, so I’m especially interested in production, logistics, and supply chain topics.

Any tips, resources, or guidance would be very helpful. Thank you in advance!

entry.title: Query error when adding a variable [%0]
entry.content:
Hello experts.

I receive an error when using a variable in my query in SAP Business One Hana.


The following query works as expected, but when I change the date ('2025-08-31') in the where clause for a variable ([%0]) it gives an error: 1). [SAP AG][LIBODBCHDB DLL][HDBODBC] Syntax error or access violation;257 sql syntax error: incorrect syntax near "UNION": line 1 col 1 'Job de programación back end' (OBSJ) (at pos 1)

SELECT
'RAZONES DE LIQUIDEZ' AS "Razón financiera",
'' AS "Razón",
'' AS "Cuenta",
NULL AS "Monto",
'' AS "Cuenta 2",
NULL AS "Monto"
FROM DUMMY

 

UNION ALL

 


SELECT
'Razón corriente' AS "Razón financiera",

TO_VARCHAR(
TO_DECIMAL(
SUM(
CASE
WHEN T1."FatherNum" IN ('101','102','103','104','105','106','107','108','109')
THEN T0."Debit" - T0."Credit"
ELSE 0
END
)
/
NULLIF(
SUM(
CASE
WHEN T1."FatherNum" IN ('203','204','204-1','204-2','205','207')
THEN T0."Credit" - T0."Debit"
ELSE 0
END
), 0
)
, 18, 4)
) AS "Razón",

'Activo corriente' AS "Cuenta",
SUM(
CASE
WHEN T1."FatherNum" IN ('101','102','103','104','105','106','107','108','109')
THEN T0."Debit" - T0."Credit"
ELSE 0
END
) AS "Monto",

'Pasivo corriente' AS "Cuenta 2",
SUM(
CASE
WHEN T1."FatherNum" IN ('203','204','204-1','204-2','205','207')
THEN T0."Credit" - T0."Debit"
ELSE 0
END
) AS "Monto"

FROM "JDT1" T0
INNER JOIN "OACT" T1 ON T0."Account" = T1."AcctCode"
WHERE
T0."RefDate" >= '2020-01-01'
AND T0."RefDate" <= '2025-08-31'

I need to use a variable [0%] instead of  the date  '2025-08-31'

When I try using the variable without the select from dummy query at the beginning, it works

I tried many ways with IA, but still can't make it work.
Thanks in advance.

entry.title: General Ledger Report not showing Dimensions data
entry.content:
Our company recently migrated to version 10 of SAP Business One.

When executing the General Ledger report, the Dimensions' information appears blank; that doesn't happen if we run the Cost Accounting reports. 

We have been working with dimensions for years in the previous versions and the information always appeared in the report.

Was there any major configuration change in the new version in regards of dimensions that might be missing?

The General Ledger report is used by all of our users and it is causing a major problem.

Any help is really appreciated.

entry.title: Invalid path on crystal reports
entry.content:
We have two computers here running SAP Business One. On one machine, trying to preview or import a Crystal Report yields the error "ungültiger Pfad für Berichtsdatei" (Invalid path for report file) - heck, why don't you write *what* path has been tried here and where it came from, to give even a chance to solve this?

The other machine can do this. I already deleted all in %temp%, I already started anew multiple times. To no avail.

So, how can I get rid of this error? It is not the report, we know from the other machine that it works.
